message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This is a good deal before inflation eats away at it further.
Come on Bob, 58-42 is as low as I'll go. Inflation is hurting both of us!
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer, take it before inflation eats away at it any further!
